meanings.definition: Aromatases: enzymes that convert androgens into estrogens.
meanings.sent1: The aromatases in the body play a crucial role in hormone balance.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of aromatases on estrogen levels.
meanings.sent3: The aromatases decided to throw a party and turn all the androgens into estrogens!
meanings.sent4: Her words had the power of aromatases, transforming his tough exterior into a softer form.
meanings.sent5: The aromatases worked tirelessly, like little alchemists, changing one hormone into another.
